item.title: sort algorithms note
item.description: heap sort in-place sort algorithms O(nlgn) 过程要点 left/right/parent可以通过(2n, 2n+1, n/2)算出. 一般数组索引从0开始，left/right/parent为(2n+1, 2n+2, (n-1)/2) 建堆算法 O(n) 堆有一个cap和一个len(当前长度) 步骤 # max-heap 保持堆性质 def max_heap(h, i): l = left(i) r = right(i) if l <= heap_size(A) && A[l] > A[i]: lg = l if r <= heap_size(A) && A[r] > A[i]: lg = r if lg != i: A[i], A[lg] = A[lg], A[i] max_heap(h, lg) # build-heap 建堆 def build_heap(h): hs = len(h) for i = hs/2; i >= 0; i--: build_heap(h, i) # heap-sort 排序 def heap_sort(A): build_heap(A) for i = len(A); i>0; i--: A[0], A[i] = A[i], A[0] A.
